de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities

Class PhysicsEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.Entity
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.PhysicsEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionGeometryOwner, CollisionListener

    public abstract class PhysicsEntity
extends Entity
    An Entity with additional physical properties (gravity, collision sliding, etc)
